sections.markdown:
#
# F5 devices per hour problems  starting time
#

input.value:
fetch events, from:now() - 24h
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0],event.status,event.id,display_id,event.name,timestamp
| summarize {problem = takeMin(record(timestamp,display_id, event.name,event.status,event.id,affected_entity_id)) },by:{display_id}
| fields display_id,problem[affected_entity_id],problem[timestamp],problem[event.name]
// | fieldsFlatten  problem
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance` |fieldsadd NodeName |fields id,NodeName],
    sourceField:`problem[affected_entity_id]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ id,NodeName}
| filter isNotNull(NodeName)
 | fields display_id,`problem[timestamp]`
 | makeTimeseries `Problems#`=count(),time: `problem[timestamp]`, interval:1h

sections.markdown:
#
# Cisco Fans # in critical state  historical data
#

input.value:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.status.descr}
| fieldsAdd LastFanState=arraylast(`t_fs`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }   
| filter LastFanState == 1 and isnotnull( envmon.fan.status.descr)
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter envmon.fan.status ==  "critical(3)"   
| fields timeframe,interval,t_fs

sections.markdown:
#
# Cisco Power Supply Unit state historical data
#

input.value:
timeseries t_fs=max( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.power_supply.state`), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,ps.label}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }   
 | filter  isNotNull(ps.label) 
| fieldsAdd PSU = concat(ps.label,"-", system_name)
| fieldsRemove ps.label, system_name,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`

timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)
| filter `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` == "CUSTOM_DEVICE-0F35AB1A6DE8A525"
| filter entity.name == "Cisco network device AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org @ 34.134.133.190:7779"
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter entity.type == "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device"
| fields `t_cpu`, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, `entity.name`, `system_name`, `entity.type`, `interval`, `timeframe`

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)
| filter `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` == "CUSTOM_DEVICE-0F35AB1A6DE8A525"
| filter entity.name == "Cisco network device AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org @ 34.134.133.190:7779"
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter entity.type == "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device"
| fields `t_cpu`, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, `entity.name`, `system_name`, `entity.type`, `interval`, `timeframe`

timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)
| filter `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` == "CUSTOM_DEVICE-0F35AB1A6DE8A525"
| filter entity.name == "Cisco network device AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org @ 34.134.133.190:7779"
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter entity.type == "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device"
| fields `t_cpu`, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, `entity.name`, `system_name`, `entity.type`, `interval`, `timeframe`

sections.markdown:
## High speed links capacity forecasting
##
**Select a link to forecast traffic for on the plots below**
**then the forecast option from the breadcrumb widget*

input.value:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`,rate:1s),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.highspeed`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad`= t_ino[]*8/(t_speed[]*10000)
| fieldsAdd LastSpeed=arraylast(`t_speed`)
| filter LastSpeed == 10000
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino,t_speed
| fields `InLoad`, `Interface`, `interval`, `timeframe`
| sort `InLoad` desc
| limit 20

query.expression:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.octets` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fields id, type, description ,speed, child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, speed, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8/toLong(speed)
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino
| sort `InLoad b/s` desc
| limit 10
| filter speed == "1000000000"
| filter Interface == "GigabitEthernet1/0/18-AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| fields `InLoad b/s`, `speed`, `Interface`, `interval`, `timeframe`

timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.octets` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fields id, type, description ,speed, child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, speed, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8/toLong(speed)
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino
| sort `InLoad b/s` desc
| limit 10
| filter speed == "1000000000"
| filter Interface == "GigabitEthernet1/0/18-AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| fields `InLoad b/s`, `speed`, `Interface`, `interval`, `timeframe`

sections.markdown:
## High speed links error rate forecasting
##
**Select a link to forecast traffic for on the plot below**

input.value:
timeseries t_inerror=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InErrors /s` = t_inerror
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_inerror
| sort `InErrors /s`  desc
| limit 10

sections.markdown:
## High speed links discard rate forecasting
##
**Select a link to forecast traffic for on the plot below**

sections.title: Top ten In discard rate forecasting

input.value:
timeseries t_indiscard=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards` , rate:1s),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `In Discards /s` = t_indiscard
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_indiscard
| sort `In Discards /s`  desc
| limit 10
